A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Very disappointing. I hate to say that\, I had such high hopes for this movie after 7 and Rouge One. However\, they dropped the ball and destroyed a trilogy that had wonderful potential. They made every male character in the movie impulsive and weak. That is a major downfall since the biggest audience for this movie is men.\nAll that aside it did have a few moments that were solid\, but either they played no roll in the story line or very minimal. \nThere was absolutely no character progression from 7 to 8\, which I was looking forward to. Kylo is still a giant brat and Rey can use the force even though she was barley trained.
